# cloudferro Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cloudferro" {
  host        = "host"
  token       = "api token"
  server_cert = "path to the cert bundle"
  region      = "WAW4-1"
}
```

### Optional

- `host` (String)
- `region` (String)
- `server_cert` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
